articles.author: Erin Doherty
articles.title: Poll: Most Americans think the government lies. Many say the American Dream is dead. - Politico
articles.description: The POLITICO Poll found more Americans say the country’s best times are behind than ahead.
articles.content:
The sense of pessimism about the future comes amid a widening perception of political polarization.
More than half of U.S. adults, 59 percent, said that political polarization is much or somewhat wo… [+1438 chars]
